title: When China Ruled the Seas book cover
content:
When China Ruled the Seas was originally published in 1994. I don't know if this was the original cover or a more recent reissue.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061507im_/http:/typophile.com/files/LevathesWhenChinaRuledSeas_3809.jpg)
  
At first glance it looks like a digital faux-oriental font.  
Any suggestions?  
Thanks  
Don

Font: 

 Seven Swordsmen BB 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061507/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

Don
